llm_summary: The recent exploit detection report indicates a critical buffer overflow attempt, with a severity rating of 75%, characterized by patterns such as "core dumped" and "stack smashing detected." This finding necessitates immediate attention due to its potential impact on system integrity. IT security personnel should prioritize an investigation into the affected systems, leveraging the attached provenance graph images (provenance_graph_buffer_overflow.png and provenance_graph_all.png) to analyze the context and source of the breach. It is recommended to apply necessary patches and implement additional monitoring measures to mitigate further risks.
